QuestData.Title: Life from Death
QuestData.Description: $R, I have a task for you.$B$BTake these ruby seeds and plant them at the corpses of any dragonkin that you come across. Twilight or Vermillion, whelping or dragon, it matters not. We need to see that their bodies are returned to the earth so that life can continue to flourish.$B$BIn death, there should always be new life. This may be our one consolation during times of war and great tragedy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant Ruby Seeds at the corpses of 6 dragonkin within the Vermillion Redoubt.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you done as I asked?
QuestData.RewardText: In this, we deny Deathwing the destruction that he so passionately seeks. In this, life continues.
